com.gensym.util
Interface ItemListener

All Known Subinterfaces:
ClassDefinition, ConnectionDefinition, Definition, MessageDefinition, ObjectDefinition
All Known Implementing Classes:
G2_ItemWrapper, EventMulticaster
public interface ItemListener
extends EventListener

Interface for receiving events regarding changes to Items. Only changes to subscribable attributes on an item are sent to ItemListeners.

NOTE: The value of a variable or parameter is not a "subscribable attribute". To receive events regarding the value of a variable or parameter, the VariableValueListener interface must be implemented.

See Also:
VariableValueListener

Method Summary
 void itemDeleted(ItemEvent e)
          Invoked when the denotation that the listener is interested in is no longer reachable.
 void itemModified(ItemEvent e)
          Invoked when the denotation that the listener is interested in changes.
 void receivedInitialValues(ItemEvent e)
          Invoked when the listener is added.
